snippet.title: 2D Owen Trailer
snippet.description:
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.owen2d.owen2d
PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1490880/2D_Owen/
https://owen2d.itch.io/2d-owen
https://gamejolt.com/games/2dowen/506055

https://twitter.com/2d_owen

2D Owen is an arcade platformer in which you can explore 8 different worlds & experience a lot of adventures.

Game features:
- Run, jump, and swim through many exciting levels
- Use Umbrella to jump, fly & shoot
- Fly with a Jetpack, Hang-Glider, Rocket Boots and Balloon
- Jump with the Pogo Stick and Bouncy Ball
- Ride a Cart, Rocket Rollers and Rolling Ball
- Explore 120 levels in 8 different worlds
- Defeat enemies & avoid many various obstacles
- Find secret locations & gain extra points

Music:
The Vendetta by Stefan Kartenberg (c) copyright 2018 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/JeffSpeed68/58628 Ft: Apoxode
